name: react-plain-json-editor
author: nariakiiwatani <nariakiiwatani@annolab.com> (https://github.com/nariakiiwatani
description: Provide a simple JSON editor for React

scripts.build:all: yarn run build && yarn run build:demo
scripts.predeploy: yarn build:all && cp demo/dist/* docs && git reset
scripts.deploy: git add docs && git commit -m 'chore: auto commit for deploying' && git push
